com.sun.tools.doclets.doccheck
Class Form

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.sun.tools.doclets.doccheck.Form
All Implemented Interfaces:
DocCheckConstants
public class Form
extends java.lang.Object
implements DocCheckConstants

A class that builds a template for a JavaDoc comment that needs to be added or corrected.

Author:
Eric Armstrong

addTag

public void addTag(java.lang.String tag,
                   int tagType)
Add a tag. If this is the first tag added, add a tag separator line.

Parameters:
tag - a String containing the tag to add
tagType - an int specifying the type of tag

addTagSpacer

public void addTagSpacer()
Add a tag spacer. Its like adding a tag, except that there is no message. It contributes to the tag count, though, so that only one separator is created.

badText

public static java.lang.String badText(java.lang.String s)
Return a string wrapped in the bad text color
